Eo Geom : Summon Swords Ver 1.2 by elysees
-Eo Geom Lightning Order

*EoGeom Optional Files - CrainteVomir 1.2 Version
*Full Version. Don't need 1.1 or 1.0 Version.

[b]SKSE 1.6.16 or Higher Version.[/b]
http://skse.silverlock.org/



[b]Lightning Order[/b]
-Require : Max 6 Sword
-Shout(Z or RB(pad)) Charge! 2.00 Sec

Damage :
oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 100%, 12Area, Knockback 8~12
10 + oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 50%, 24Area * 6 Hit



::Console Command::
If you want Lightning Order charge time edit.
` > Set eogeomLightningOrderChargeTime to 2.0
default value 2.0 (2.0=2 Second)

~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~
Eo Geom : Summon Swords Ver 1.1 by elysees
-Eo Geom Continuation Slash

7:13, 28 Jun 2014
*Fix : Windows Error Beep

*Ver 1.1 Not work? > recommand Mod Reset or New Save File
*EoGeom Optional Files - CrainteVomir 1.1 Version
*Full Version. Don't need 1.0 Version.




::Eo Geom Continuation Slash
How to Use
-PowerAttack(not Stand) > Eo Geom Continuation Mode(during 6 second) > WeaponSwing or WeaponLeftSwing
-Damage : 5 + oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 10%* 4 Hit

*ADD Eo Geom Standby Mode Animation
*ADD Eo Geom Unsummon : Weapon Sheathe > 6 second




::Console Command::
If you want EoGeom Unsummon require time edit.
` > Set eogeomDuration to 6.0
default value 6.0 (6.0=6 Second)

If you want EoGeom Continuation Mode Duration time edit.
` > Set eogeomContinuationDuration to 6.0
default value 6.0 (6.0=6 Second)




*Be careful Script Struck.
-Werewolf transformation, New Game Helgen escape, Can't target Dragon Flight, etc...

~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~.~

Eo Geom : Summon Swords
Eo Geom (Mean Control and Rule the Sword)

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Auto Targeting
-Summon Swords > Attack !!! (WeaponSwing or WeaponLeftSwing)
-Damage : 10 + oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 25%
-Requre : Magicka 10 per 1 Sword



::Console Command::
If you want damage edit.
` > Set eogeomDamageRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)

If you want Require Magicka edit.
` > Set eogeomMagicka to 10.0
default value Magicka 10

If you want Auto Targeting Radius edit.
` > Set eogeomLockOnRadius to 2400
default value 2400. Skyrim distance.



::CREDIT::
Lily's Rapier by Hentai (zotman12)
